subject: My Dearest:
body:
My Dearest:
Thanks a lot for your response and compassionate concern for me, my daughter needs a home to live in and grow well, I am undergoing series of surgery procedures to repair my spinal cord due to severe injuries from the Russian  missile bombs explosions which killed my husband and two children, my Daughter Zlata was lucky to be alive due to her being in a far away boarding school in Mariupol although Russian army also attacked Mariupol
but her school's students were evacuated by the RED CROSS into Warsaw Poland and transferred to a British RedCross facility in London where she is now presently and I will be most grateful if you will quickly accept the responsibility of taking custody of my late Husband's deposited fund so you will be able to invest for my daughter ZLATA TKACHENKOV as she is the only surviving child and if I did not make it from the delicate life threatening Spinal Cord Surgeries I must undergo to repair my severely damaged spinal cord, then you will be the only one to cater for my daughter if I am no longer alive but I pray that I survive so my Daughter will not be an orphan, but I must make this plans with you to take care of my daughter just in case I did not make it out alive from the delicate surgery procedures.
So please give me some more details about yourself like as follows
Your Age, Marital Status do you have a wife and kids and if so do you think they will accept and welcome my daughter into your home and show her love like a family member.
Do you have any business or investment ideas for Investing the $12,000,000.00 Million dollars my late husband has in deposit, I will authorize the Financial Institution where the fund is lodged to release the fund to your account which you will provide.
Kindly send Copies of your I.D Card , Driver's License for Identification Purpose as I will forward these to the Financial Institution for release of the fund to your bank account.
Kindly Get back to me with strong assurances that you are ready, willing and able to be fully dedicated and committed to take good care of my daughter and only surviving child Zlata and the $12,000,000.00 funds to invest it properly and make my daughter Zlata have a good future life.
Kindly give me your cell phone number to reach you as I may send the Surgeon Doctor to call you to pass messages from me to you if  I don't feel strong enough to talk, but I will really love to talk with you.
You can also contact my daughter Here below is my daughter s email (
bigjaylake28@gmail.com
 )
Yours sincerely
Mrs Monica Tkachenkov.

subject: Re:   My Dearest:
body:
Hello Mrs. Monica,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm really sorry to hear about the difficult situation you and your daughter are going through. It must be incredibly tough for both of you.

I understand that you're looking for someone who can provide a home and take care of your daughter, Zlata, in case something happens to you during the surgery. It's important to ensure her well-being and future.

To answer your questions, I am , and I am currently . Unfortunately, I don't have any children of my own at the moment. However, I believe that family is not just about blood relations but also about love, care, and support. If it comes to welcoming Zlata into my home, I would do my best to make her feel loved and cared for as a family member.

Regarding the investment of the funds, it would be helpful if you could provide more details about your late husband's deposited fund. What kind of investment opportunities are available? Are there any specific guidelines or restrictions on how the money should be invested?

As for sending copies of my driver's license, I prefer not to share personal identification documents online for security reasons. However, we can explore alternative ways to establish trust and ensure transparency in our communication.

Please let me know how we can proceed further in discussing this matter. If there's anything else you'd like to know or discuss, please feel free to ask.

Best wishes,
Jon
